properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 5 at 2:19AM MST until February 7 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 20
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times in heavy
snowfall. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY
